snippet: Macy’s announced that the giant character balloons and floats will be joined by the opera star Renée Fleming, the Broadway singer Idina Menzel and Sting.
abstract: Macy’s announced that the giant character balloons and floats will be joined by the opera star Renée Fleming, the Broadway singer Idina Menzel and Sting.

headline.main: Sting and Renée Fleming Among Thanksgiving Day Parade Performers
